content: this pattern requires techniques as double_crochet chain stitches front post and back post double_crochet for ribbing the sweater is worked top-down to make the v neckline we will start with less stitches for front panels and we will increase at the beginning and at the end of the round until both front panels together have the same number of stitches as the back panel because of the diamond stitch pattern we are using for this sweater the v neck will have same depth for sizes s and m but for sizes l xl and 2xl will be shorter with 1 and 2 row this sweater has an oversized fit with deep yoke depth and wide sleeves the pattern is available in 5 sizes from small to 2x large and is written in us terms
